Author: volida
Content: daemon(s) originates from the Greek word deimon http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daemon_%28mythology%29 which means someone who is wise, knows things, has wide and wise knowledge of something. In the ancient Greek times it was not linked to the concept they are now.
